duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitoring the quality of an existing portfolio of C&I companies totaling $250MM.
Ensure that customer relationships are managed to maximize the opportunity for the bank, while taking into account bank risk and customer needs.

education_certification.credential: Master's or Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, or Accounting. Minimum 7 years commercial banking experience in relationship/portfolio management. Formal credit training or proven knowledge of credit products and functions.
